ygData.msgSnippet: ... Learn from my mistake.  I concentrated on piercing upto level 14 and maxed out the skill.  With a Giant Snake Fang it works very well. Once you advance,
ygData.messageBody:
> I would like to inquire as to your preferences of melee
> weapon. I am a
> level 9 right now and am at the point where I am thinking
> about seeking a
> magical weapon. I am sure at higher levels I won't even
> want to get NEAR
> the monster I am fighting to melee, but at this point I can
> still get some
> decent damage and save mana finishing off creatures with melee.
>

Learn from my mistake. I concentrated on piercing upto level 14 and
maxed out the skill. With a Giant Snake Fang it works very well.
Once you advance, however, you will start encountering people with the
beautiful Runed Totem Staff, which (from memory) is 8dmg, 47 delay,
+5HP and +5 mana, AND allows you to fight magical creatures. It's a
2h blunt weapon. I had neglected 2H upto then and am STILL trying to
get it maxed.
So my advice is, get a nice worn Greater Staff (or another decent
beginner staff) and use that until you can afford a Runed Totem Staff.
The Runed will cost you between 20 and 30pp (usually) and is superior
to almost anything else out there.

Aznyin
Level 15 Erudite Wizard
Chivalric Order of Norrath
Current Residence: Rivervale [Solusek Ro]
